effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
